name: Velvet Camaral
flavorText: This flamboyant headdress was fashioned long ago by a fashion-conscious Harakas mage to make an impression at a peace summit between her clan and the Sarandesh. The highly conductive properties that make it so valuable in combat were merely a happy accident. Regardless, when the meeting of the clans turned violent, it was those attributes that made the more lasting impact.
flavorTextHtml: This flamboyant headdress was fashioned long ago by a fashion-conscious Harakas mage to make an impression at a peace summit between her clan and the Sarandesh. The highly conductive properties that make it so valuable in combat were merely a happy accident. Regardless, when the meeting of the clans turned violent, it was those attributes that made the more lasting impact.

secondary.textHtml: Double the number of enemies your Electrocute jumps to. (Wizard Only)
secondary.text: Double the number of enemies your Electrocute jumps to.  (Wizard Only)
